tool.name: Testing Tool
tool.command:
mkdir -p '${ html.files_path }' &&
wget -q -O - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neoformit/alphafold-galaxy/embedded/index.html > ${ html.files_path }/index.html &&
wget -q -O - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neoformit/alphafold-galaxy/main/data/ranked_0.pdb > $data &&
cp $data '${ html.files_path }/ranked_0.pdb' && cp '${html.files_path}'/index.html output.html
